bibl.title: Landbouw en het "taxes-and-trade model" in Romeins Egypte. [Agriculture et le "taxes-and-trade model" en Égypte romaine.] Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: "To write a satisfactory economic history of at least one province of the Roman empire we need series of documents. These we find in the Egyptian papyri. The papyri allow us to construct a 'taxes-and-trade model' for early Roman Egypt with a minimum of arbitrary figures. They also allow us to write a detailed history of Egyptian agriculture in the Roman period."
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, Landbouw en het "taxes-and-trade model" in Romeins Egypte. [Agriculture et le "taxes-and-trade model" en Égypte romaine.] Avec résumé en anglais.

"To write a satisfactory economic history of at least one province of the Roman empire we need series of documents. These we find in the Egyptian papyri. The papyri allow us to construct a 'taxes-and-trade model' for early Roman Egypt with a minimum of arbitrary figures. They also allow us to write a detailed history of Egyptian agriculture in the Roman period."
